page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Adult activities - Village band, Bowls, Darts, Fishing, Gardening, Old Peoples Club, Mother & Toddler Group, Mothers' Union, Young Wives, Women's Institute, Keep-Fit, Jogging. Several pass social evenings at the "Six Bells" public house, at Bingo sessions, Whist Drives, or merely watching television. Children's activities - Football, Fishing, Scouts, Girl Guides, Brownies, Woodcraft Folk, Youth Clubs, Disco dancing, Roller skating, Rounders, Swimming, Tennis, Ballet & Tap Dancing. Most of these activities take place in the Village Hall, the centre of village social life. Some sports take place on the Thornham Magna Estate, 2 km. east of Gislingham village.
